Get up to $540 when you bring your phone. Or get iPhone 14 Pro or iPhone 14 on us. Online only. With Unlimited Ultimate. Buy now | Offer Details $540 via promo credit when you add a new smartphone line with your own 4G/5G smartphone on Unlimited Ultimate plan req'd. Promo credit applied over 36 months; promo credits end if eligibility requirements are no longer met. Promotional credits for this Bring your own Device (BYOD) offer may not be combined with other promotional offers. Limited time offer.Up to $999.99 device payment or full retail purchase w/ new smartphone line on Unlimited Ultimate plan req'd. Less up to $999.99 promo credit applied over 36 mos.; promo credit ends if eligibility req’s are no longer met; 0% APR. end of navigation menu Cut the cable. Switch to Verizon Home Internet. Check availability Fast, reliable home internet. So you can binge, game and work at the speed you need. Choose a plan that fits your needs. So you can get the speed and features that are right for you. The price is the price, guaranteed. So you don't need to worry about unexpected price hikes. It’s your home. It’s your Verizon. We offer three primary internet products, Fios Home Internet, 5G Home Internet and LTE Home Internet. Check out which internet service is available in your area. Check availability Choose an extra, on us. With select Verizon Home Internet plans. Get the powerful HomePod, on us. A value of $299.99. With select Verizon Home Internet plans. Review details Review details Get the powerful HomePod, on us. A value of $299.99. With select Verizon Home Internet plans. Retail Price: $299.99 Features HomePod delivers groundbreaking, premium sound, from clear, detailed highs to deep, rich bass. Advanced computational audio pushes acoustics further. Spatial Audio provides even more immersive sound. Works seamlessly with all your Apple devices. Connect and control your smart home, privately and securely. HomePod: Offer valid thru 11.8.23. For new home internet customers who activate/install and maintain eligible Verizon Home Internet services in good standing for 65 days and redeem offer w/in 60 days thereafter, or by no later than 4.8.24, whichever is first. Verizon reserves the right to charge back the value of the Apple device on promotion if eligible service is canceled w/in 180 days. One offer per eligible Verizon account. Get a $200 Verizon Gift Card, on us. With select Verizon Home Internet plans. Review details Review details Get a $200 Verizon Gift Card, on us. With select Verizon Home Internet plans. Features Verizon Gift Cards can be applied towards a new device, accessory, or simply pay your Verizon Wireless or Fios bill. Any unused balance remains on the card until it is spent. Offer ends 11.8.23. For new home internet customers who activate or install and maintain eligible Verizon Home Internet services in good standing for 65 days and register for the Gift Card w/in 60 days thereafter, or by no later than 4.8.24, whichever is first. Gift Card emailed within 48 hours of registration. We reserve the right to charge back the amount of the Gift Card if eligible service is canceled w/in 180 days. Other Gift Card terms and conditions apply. Close See if you qualify for free home internet. With the Affordable Connectivity Program and the Verizon Forward Program, your home may qualify for free internet. Find out more and apply today. Learn more Have questions? We’ve got answers. Where is Verizon Home Internet available? And what home internet services are available to me? It's all about the internet technology, how it’s delivered to your home and where you live. Fios Home Internet is widely available in metro and suburban areas of New England and the Mid-Atlantic. 5G Home Internet is now in more and more cities around the country. Since LTE Home Internet uses the wireless 4G LTE network to deliver home broadband internet service, it is available in most parts of the country where Fios and 5G Home Internet are not available. To see which Verizon Home Internet service is available where you live, click here. What is 5G Home Internet? 5G Home Internet is fast, reliable home internet powered by 5G Ultra Wideband, so you can game, stream and connect the way you want. 5G Ultra Wideband is now in more and more places around the country, so more people than ever can experience Verizon's exceptional broadband internet at home. To learn what home internet is available at your address, check availability. What is Fios Internet? Fios Internet is a 100% fiber-optic network that delivers some of the fastest internet speeds to millions of homes in the mid-Atlantic and New England. It uses fiber optics to transmit data at the speed of light, providing a fast internet connection and powerful bandwidth for multiple devices. Verizon is one of the only internet service providers to offer matching download and upload speeds on most of our plans, which is a major advantage when you’re video chatting, gaming and sharing large files or images. What is LTE Home Internet? LTE Home Internet is home broadband internet service that brings the Verizon 4G LTE network to your residence. It is available in certain areas where there are no other Verizon broadband options (Fios, 5G Home, etc.). With LTE Home Internet, you can stream video at 1080p, plus you can enjoy unlimited data with no data usage caps. Does Verizon Home Internet participate in the Affordable Connectivity Program? Yes. The ACP is a federal program that provides subsidized internet service for eligible customers. ACP qualified customers can get: Up to one $30/month subsidy for each eligible household Up to one $75/month subsidy for each eligible household on Tribal lands If you qualify for ACP, the subsidy can be applied to Verizon Home Internet plans. Both new and existing customers can take advantage of it. Learn more Can Verizon help cover my early termination fee when I switch to Verizon Home Internet? Yes! If you are stuck in a contract for home internet, switch to Verizon Home Internet and get up to $500 credit to help cover your early termination fee. If you're eligible to get a bill credit for up to $500 for an early termination fee charged by your previous home internet provider, here's how to get it. If you order Fios home internet, see the Fios Early Termination Fee instructions. If you order 5G Home, go to the 5G Home Internet bill credit page. You must submit your request within 90 days of your Verizon Home Internet setup. Can I transfer my current Verizon Home Internet service to a new address? We make it easy to stay connected. Check out our page on moving Verizon Home Internet service or log into your account to get started. You're almost done. Finish your order to get 5G Home Internet today, with our 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee. Plus, get up to $500 towards early termination fees when you make the switch. 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee: You will be charged for monthly service on your activation date. If you cancel service w/in 30 days of activation, we will issue a refund for your service usage for up to 30 days (excluding equipment, professional setup charges, late fees, entertainment subscriptions and account add-ons) as a one-time bill credit or to the original payment method. You must return all Verizon-owned equipment w/in 30 days of cancellation; refund will be issued 30-60 days after equipment return. Limit of one credit on one eligible address on your account. Early Termination Fees: For new Verizon Home Internet customers who terminated their prior internet service and incurred an early termination fee (ETF) within the last 4 months. Offer is non-transferable and has no cash or refund value. Documentation of the ETF for internet from your prior service provider must be provided w/in 90 days after Verizon Home internet installation/setup and offer will be fulfilled via bill credit, to your Verizon account, in the amount of the ETF up to $500. You remain solely responsible for paying the ETF to your prior service provider. If we or you cancel your Verizon Home Internet service w/in 90 days after installation/setup, the ETF credit will be charged back to your final bill. Other terms apply. Go to Cart Your cart’s waiting. So are our best offers. Still want LTE Home Internet? It’s a great time to buy. Plug-n-play self-setup. Set up Verizon Internet Gateway router yourself in under 5 minutes. 30-day satisfaction guarantee. You get 30 days to decide if you love it. Award-winning 4G LTE network. America’s most reliable network delivers the connection your family needs. You remain solely responsible for paying the ETF to your prior service provider. If we or you cancel your Verizon Home Internet service w/in 90 days after installation/setup, the ETF credit will be charged back to your final bill. Other terms apply. Have a phone you love? Get up to $540 when you bring your phone. Or get iPhone 14 Pro or iPhone 14 on us. Online only. With Unlimited Ultimate. Buy now | Offer Details $540 via promo credit when you add a new smartphone line with your own 4G/5G smartphone on Unlimited Ultimate plan req'd. Promo credit applied over 36 months; promo credits end if eligibility requirements are no longer met. Promotional credits for this Bring your own Device (BYOD) offer may not be combined with other promotional offers. Limited time offer.Up to $999.99 device payment or full retail purchase w/ new smartphone line on Unlimited Ultimate plan req'd. Less up to $999.99 promo credit applied over 36 mos.; promo credit ends if eligibility req’s are no longer met; 0% APR. end of navigation menu Welcome to your Accessibility Resource Center. At Verizon, we’re striving to move our world forward through diversity, equity and inclusion. This means improving the customer experience for everyone. Explore key accessibility features. Live Caption Enable your device to detect speech and automatically generate captions during phone calls or even while listening to music with lyrics. Live Caption for iOS Live Caption for Android Universal Switch For those who have difficulty touching device screens, designate certain touches or gestures to control specific actions on your phone. Switch Control for iOS Switch Access for Android Display Settings Take advantage of high contrast, large display, large fonts, high contrast fonts, zoom, magnification and much more. Display Settings for iOS Text and Display for Android Accessibility Shortcuts Make it quick and easy to turn on or switch between your accessibility apps. Accessibility Shortcut for iOS Accessibility Shortcut for Android Sound Amplification Filter, augment and amplify the sounds in your environment or on your iOS or Android device. Live Listen for iOS Sound Amplifier for Android Find what works for you. Vision Discover products like screen readers and dictation apps designed to help the blind or those with low vision. Learn more Hearing Features like real-time text (RTT), text telephone (TTY) and closed captioning can assist users with auditory impairments. Learn more Cognitive Use a variety of tools built into your device to help you stay organized and on track throughout the day. Learn more Mobility Interact with your devices via other assistive devices, your voice, facial expressions, gestures or a simple tap. Learn more Aging Discover new technologies that enable people to live healthier, more fulfilling lives at all ages. Learn more Neurodiverse Stay focused with features that reduce distractions or temporarily limit your device to operate only one app at a time. Learn more Verizon Accessibility Statement. Increasing access. We want to make sure that every customer has the chance to get the very most from their Verizon digital experience. Accessing the products and services we offer online should be an easy, rewarding, and satisfying experience. That is why we are committed to making our digital space accessible for customers of all abilities. Optimizing your experience. To optimize the digital experience for all of our customers, we strive to meet the online accessibility standards recommended by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) in its Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 AA. We take a number of steps to attempt to meet or exceed those standards: We utilize various assistive technology across desktop, tablets, mobile devices, and in-store to test against the WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility guidelines. We work with our Advocates for Disability, Accessibility, Neurodiversity, and Caregiver Empowerment (ADVANCE) resource group, as well as industry partners, to remain informed about accessibility issues and to improve user experiences. We have a diverse and inclusive team of accessibility professionals who are continuously working to make each customer’s digital experience the best it can be. Improving constantly. Our commitment to accessibility doesn’t stop. We continue to assess and reassess our content to create a more accessible user experience across our digital spaces. Accessibility quick links. Accessibility settings Learn more about accessibility settings for iOS and Android devices. Accessibility news See the latest accessibility updates from Verizon. Resources Explore all the tools available to you. The Valuable 500 We are an Iconic Partner in advancing innovations for disability inclusion. Contact us. Reach us via chat support. Recibe hasta $540 al traer tu teléfono a Verizon. O llévate el iPhone 14 Pro o iPhone 14 por nuestra cuenta. Solo en línea. Con Unlimited Ultimate. Compra ya | Detalles de la oferta $540 a través de un crédito promocional al agregar una línea de smartphone nueva con tu smartphone 4G/5G en el plan Unlimited Ultimate. El crédito promocional se aplica durante 36 meses; los créditos promocionales terminan si se dejan de cumplir los requisitos de elegibilidad. Los créditos promocionales de esta oferta Trae tu propio dispositivo (BYOD) no se pueden combinar con otras ofertas promocionales. Verizon también recibió la mayor cantidad de premios en calidad de red por 31.ª vez en comparación con las demás marcas en los estudios U.S. Wireless Network Quality Performance Studies, volumen 1 y 2, 2003-2023, de J.D. Power. La calidad de la red mide la satisfacción de los clientes con el rendimiento de su red entre proveedores de servicios móviles. Para obtener información detallada del premio J.D. Power 2023, visita jdpower.com/awards. 2. La red 5G más confiable según más calificaciones en primer lugar en evaluaciones de confiabilidad de datos 5G de RootMetrics de 125 mercados metropolitanos realizadas en 2H 2022. Probado en 3 redes móviles nacionales. Las experiencias pueden ser diferentes. No es un aval de Verizon. 3. Verizon Wireless recibió el puntaje más alto entre los proveedores de servicios móviles para pequeños negocios en los estudios J.D. Power 2021-2022 U.S. Business Wireless Satisfaction, que miden las percepciones de los clientes empresariales con su actual proveedor de servicios móviles. Visita jdpower.com/awards para obtener más detalles. Ultra 5G (Certified Pre-Owned)Phantom Black Phantom Silver PreviousPage 1 selected1Page 1 selected2NextLearn more about free phonesHow can I get a free phone?If you’re looking for free phone deals for new phones, start with your phone service provider. At Verizon, many different promotions are available throughout the year that can allow you to get free or discounted smartphones, even from top brands like Apple, Samsung, Google and more. From new to certified pre-owned, Verizon can help in your search for a free cell phone.If you’re wondering how to get these great deals, start by exploring the multiple free phone promotion options that exist currently. Some promotions, like bringing your own device (BYOD) or trading-in your old smartphone, can allow you to bring over or trade your existing device for a brand new one, sometimes at no cost at all. Additionally, you can get a certified pre-owned (or, “CPO”) phone (including the latest Apple and Android devices) from Verizon sometimes at no cost, too, with applicable promotions. Finally, there are occasions when buy-one-get-one free phone promotions are running, which is another great way to save.To explore which phones are eligible for which promotions, you can browse Verizon’s smartphone deals.What else should I know about free phones?If you’re looking for government programs for free or reduced phones, there are options available for many individuals and households. In the modern age, having a cell phone that you and your family can rely on is essential, and programs like the Lifeline Assistance Program and Life Wireless can aid you in subsidizing a phone or phone service if you can’t cover the cost on your own.What’s more, those who qualify for other government programs like SNAP, Medicaid, and so forth may be eligible for other free phone programs, depending on the state you live in and your preferred cell phone service provider. No matter which brand you’re interested in, there is likely a free phone option available to you. From top brands like Apple, Samsung and Google to everything beyond, you can explore Verizon’s free phone promotions and deals year-round to learn which promotions you may be eligible for. Fios Home Phone Includes international calls to a country or destination of your choice. $25.00 /mo Select Switching to Fios is simple. Say goodbye to slow internet. Sign up for Fios, it's easier than ever. No annual contracts. So you have the flexibility you deserve. Get up to $500 to help you switch. So you can worry less about leaving your current provider. Flexible installation windows. So you can get set up on your schedule. Three easy steps to getFios Home Internet for free. Customers who qualify for the Affordable Connectivity Program can get Fios for free. When you combine the Affordable Connectivity Program and Verizon Forward Program discounts. Step 1 Apply to the Affordable Connectivity Program by clicking here. Step 2 Order Fios Home Internet service for your home. Step 3 Once installed, call 1.800.Verizon or click here to get the discounts applied to your bill. Check availability Have questions? We’ve got answers. What TV and internet packages are available in my area? We let you decide what kind of TV and internet package is best for your needs. With three Fios home internet plans and five Fios TV plans (including Spanish-language options) to choose from, you have the freedom to mix & match services, without any annual contracts. Check to see if Fios is available in your area. Is bundling cable and internet a better deal than subscriptions? Subscriptions may require a yearly contract or more and possible early termination fees. But with Fios there's no annual contract, internet plans start at $39.99/mo. with Auto Pay & equipment charges, and you have a choice of live TV and streaming plans. You can't go wrong personalizing your own TV and internet bundle with Verizon Fios. How can I figure out which TV and internet package is right for me? You can take advantage of the Fios TV Test Drive, which lets you explore 425+ channels for 60 days at our lowest price. After 60 days, we will recommend the best plan for you. To choose the right internet plan for you, consider your household’s needs for video calls, gaming and streaming and how many devices are being used. Higher-speed internet plans typically allow more devices to use the internet at the same time. What if I already have Verizon Fios internet? If you already have Verizon Fios Internet and want to add Fios TV, check out the options above or get more information about TV plans. Can I upgrade or change my current Verizon internet plan? Of course! With no annual contracts and no surprise fees, customers can change their Verizon Fios internet plans anytime. Log in to My Verizon or check out existing customer deals. Have a phone you love? Get up to $540 when you bring your phone. Or get iPhone 14 Pro or iPhone 14 on us. Online only. With Unlimited Ultimate. Buy now | Offer Details $540 via promo credit when you add a new smartphone line with your own 4G/5G smartphone on Unlimited Ultimate plan req'd. Promo credit applied over 36 months; promo credits end if eligibility requirements are no longer met. Promotional credits for this Bring your own Device (BYOD) offer may not be combined with other promotional offers. Limited time offer.Up to $999.99 device payment or full retail purchase w/ new smartphone line on Unlimited Ultimate plan req'd. Less up to $999.99 promo credit applied over 36 mos.; promo credit ends if eligibility req’s are no longer met; 0% APR. end of navigation menu Bring your phone and get $540. With select Unlimited plans. Get started Get started Are you a new or existing Verizon mobile customer? New Customer Existing Customer Three easy steps and you’re set. 1 Tell us which device you’re bringing, and whether you’re keeping your number. 2 Choose one of our Unlimited plans, or add a new line to an existing plan. All at a price you’ll love. 3 Activate your device today with eSIM, or get a SIM card in the mail. Let’s get started. Which device are you bringing? Phones Tablets Smart watch Other Get myPlan for $25/line. Per month for 4 lines on Unlimited Welcome with Auto Pay. Plus taxes and fees. When you keep your phones. Get started Get started Are you a new or existing Verizon mobile customer? New Customer Existing Customer Are you a new or existing Verizon mobile customer? New Customer Existing Customer Your BYOD Questions Answered. How do I bring devices to Verizon? To BYOD to Verizon from a third party seller, retailer, manufacturer, or from another carrier (e.g., T-Mobile, AT&T, etc.) start at our BYOD page. There, you'll check your device's compatibility, set up your number, choose a plan and set up your payment method. Once that’s done, use My Verizon to activate your device on our network. Note: you must be the Account Owner or Account Manager to add a new line of service to an existing Verizon account. Learn about account access roles. How do I bring my SIM or eSIM devices to Verizon? To BYOD, your device’s SIM card or eSIM must be compatible with the Verizon mobile network. Check BYOD compatibility. SIM cards: If the SIM card of the device you’re bringing isn’t compatible with the Verizon mobile network, you’ll need a new one. See How do I get a new or replacement SIM card? eSIM devices: If your device has a built-in eSIM you can BYOD with the My Verizon app. Learn how: How do I activate an eSIM device on a new Verizon line of service? How do I add a new line of service for a device I’m bringing over to Verizon? If you're the Account Owner or Account Manager, you can add a line in My Verizon. Learn more about account access roles. Note: For prepaid accounts, refer to our Prepaid Family Account FAQs for instructions on adding a line. How do I find my device ID or IMEI? To bring your device to Verizon, you need to know the Device ID (IMEI, MEID and/or ESN). Here's how to find your device ID: Non-Verizon customers, on your device go to: Android: Settings > About Phone iOS: Settings > General > About Basic phones: Tools & Settings > About Phone > Status Verizon customers: Go to My Devices in My Verizon. Tap or click Manage Device next to the device you want to view. Your Device ID and IMEI are listed under the Device Information section. Watch How to find your device ID for more options. Can I bring my own device from another phone company? Yes, if your device is compatible with the Verizon mobile network, you can bring it over from another carrier (e.g., AT&T, T-Mobile, etc.). Check your device’s compatibility. Note: To check compatibility, you need the device ID. To find your device ID, on your device go to: Android: Settings > About Phone iOS: Settings > General > About Basic phones: Tools & Settings > About Phone > Status Watch How to find your device ID for more options. What devices can I bring to Verizon with BYOD? You can bring smartphones, tablets, and smartwatches that you bought from Verizon, a third-party seller (e.g., Best Buy, Amazon, etc.), another phone carrier (e.g., AT&T, T-Mobile, etc.) or even a manufacturer. You can bring Apple®, Google, Samsung and other Android™ devices to Verizon. To be eligible for BYOD to Verizon, your device must be unlocked and its hardware and software must be compatible with our mobile network. Check your device’s compatibility. Can I bring an eSIM or Dual SIM device from another carrier to Verizon? Yes, when you bring an eSIM or dual SIM device from another carrier, keep in mind: Some carriers lock their devices. A locked device will only work on that carrier's network. If your carrier has locked your device, you need to contact them to have them unlock the device (if eligible). After the carrier has unlocked the device, it can take up to 24 hours before you can activate your device with Verizon. Learn how to activate eSIM on a new Verizon line of service. Can I keep my phone number when I bring my own device? You may be able to bring your mobile number along when you bring your device to Verizon. Learn how at our Bring your number to Verizon FAQs. Note: When you're bringing a phone number to Verizon, don't cancel your service with your other carrier until we've activated your new line. Have questions about Verizon’s Refer a Friend program? We’ve got answers. Who is eligible for Verizon's Referral program? Both current and new mobile customers can benefit from Verizon's Refer a Friend program. If you are already a Verizon customer, you can generate a code to send to up to 10 of your friends and family members who are not already Verizon customers and have not been with Verizon in the last 90 days. What do I need to do to refer a friend to Verizon and take advantage of the program? To refer a friend, you can generate a code to share with up to 10 people who are not already Verizon customers (and haven't been for at least 90 days). When they use the code to sign up for a new Verizon Unlimited postpaid line and keep that line active and in good standing for at least 30 days, you’ll get $15 off your monthly bills for a year. Referral codes may only be redeemed through a digital order on verizon.com or the My Verizon App. Refer a Friend rewards should appear on your bill in 1-2 bill cycles. What are the steps to get Refer a Friend credits? As the referring person, get started by using any device on your Verizon mobile phone plan to generate a Refer a Friend code: Visit the Refer a Friend dashboard in My Verizon. Click the generated code. Share the generated code with family and friends by text, email, QR code, link, etc. Each code is unique, can be used only once and expires after 60 days You can view the code's progress on the Refer a Friend dashboard. Your friend gets an invitation explaining their options to switch to Verizon with their referral code. They can use the link in the referral message to visit the Refer a Friend homepage and choose to either: Switch - Follow the prompts to change to Verizon and use their referral code. The Refer a Friend credit is applied to the new account's first bill. The credit may be prorated depending on when in the bill cycle they join. After your friend has service for 30 days, you get the first of your 12 monthly credits (the credit is applied within 1 or 2 bill cycles). Free Trial - Follow the prompts for a 30 day Free Trial of Verizon service. After the trial ends, your friend has 60 days to redeem the Refer a Friend code you sent and switch to Verizon. Learn more about Verizon's Free Trial. I've been referred to Verizon, what are my next steps? Referral codes may be redeemed through a digital order on verizon.com or via your dashboard on the My Verizon App. When you use your referral code to sign up for a line, and you have 30 days to activate an account before you start getting credits of $15 per month towards your monthly bill for 12 months. To receive your referral reward, you have to bring the phone number for at least 1 line on the account you set up (a "port-in" to Verizon), which hasn't been active on the Verizon network within the last 90 days. What are the benefits of referring someone to Verizon? As an existing customer, when you refer a friend to Verizon, you both save $15 per month off your bills for a year. That's $180 in savings. And since you can have up to 10 referrals, that means a max savings of $150/mo or $1,800/year! If you were sent a referral code as a new customer, then just use that code to join Verizon and save $15/mo for a year for each line you activate. Add up to 12 lines to save up to $2160/yr. Can I try the network before I accept the Verizon referral? Yes. You can try Verizon, America's most reliable 5G network* for 30 days, on us. You can keep your own eSIM-enabled device, phone number and current carrier. If you switch, you'll get your referral bonus. Just be sure to write down your referral code so it's handy when you’re ready to join. *Most reliable 5G network based on more first place rankings in RootMetrics® 5G data reliability assessments of 125 metro markets conducted in 1H 2023. Tested with best commercially available smartphones on three national mobile networks across all available network types. Your experiences may vary. RootMetrics rankings are not an endorsement of Verizon. What happens if my friend cancels their service before the yearly reward ends? Once they begin their plan, after their free trial period, you'll receive a credit on your bill, which should appear in 1-2 bill cycles. If they cancel or transfer away their line of service, you'll lose the referral reward associated with that line. And, sorry—referral rewards cannot be restored after they have been removed. What are some other Verizon programs that I can benefit from? At Verizon we have several programs aimed at helping people save on their bills. There are Senior Plans for customers aged 55 or over. There are also added programs available for groups like first responders, military and veterans, nurses, teachers and students. Verizon customers who are approved for the FCC's Affordable Connectivity Program can even get free Verizon Home Internet with the Verizon Forward Program. 1. Verizon is #1 for Network Quality in the Northeast, Mid-Atlantic, Southeast, North Central, Southwest, West regions. Verizon has also received the highest number of awards in network quality for the 31st time as compared to all other brands in the J.D. Power 2003-2023 Volume 1 and 2 U.S. Wireless Network Quality Performance Studies. Network Quality measures customers’ satisfaction with their network performance with wireless carriers. For J.D. Power 2023 award information, visit jdpower.com/awards for more details. $199.99PreviousPage 1 selected1Page 1 selected234NextSmartphonesExplore smartphones from all the top brands with Verizon.Whether you're an Apple aficionado, a Samsung fan, or a Google connected hub type of household (or anything in between), you can shop top smartphone brands any time at Verizon. You may even be looking to bring your own device to Verizon, or purchase a certified pre-owned or unlocked phone, in which case we can say– you've definitely got options.At Verizon, you can browse your pick of smartphones and available deals on top brands, as well as explore the best cell phone service plans for your needs. If you're shopping for yourself alone, you may be interested in some of the latest and greatest in smartphone tech, as well as a 5G Unlimited Plan that allows you to get more done on the go. If you're looking for a family plan, you may want to explore the best kid-friendly or senior-friendly cell phones, and look into adding a line or bundling services. Additionally, if you're looking specifically for 5G enabled smartphones, you can shop for those, too– and discover Verizon 5G Ultra Wideband near you in more and more cities. And with 5G covering 200 Million+, you can listen, stream, and video chat in 5G quality across the country. (5G Ultra Wideband available in select areas.)Getting the latest phone deals on top smartphone brands from Verizon.If you're an Apple product owner, you know how convenient it can be to keep all your devices connected. That said, you may be looking for a new smartphone and opting to go with one of the latest iPhone models. In that case, you can shop iPhone deals any time at Verizon.More interested in an Android device? The Samsung Galaxy or Flip series may be right for you, and you can shop deals on various Samsung models, too. If Google is more your taste, you can also shop deals on Google smartphones and see which phones are eligible for promotions.Cell phones, including 5G enabled smartphones, are the way of the future. From snapping nearly-professional looking photos and videos, to sending texts and browsing your social media and beyond, your phone can allow you to do it all on the go. Learn more America's most reliable 5G network based on more first place rankings in RootMetrics© 5G data reliability assessments of 125 metro markets conducted in 2H 2021. Tested with best commercially available smartphones on three national mobile networks across all available network types, excluding C-band. Your experiences may vary. RootMetrics rankings are not an endorsement of Verizon. Have questions? We've got answers. What is the difference between 5G Ultra Wideband and 5G Nationwide? Verizon offers two types of 5G service: 5G Ultra Wideband and 5G Nationwide. 5G Ultra Wideband is Verizon's highest performing 5G. Our 5G Ultra Wideband network uses high band (mmWave) and mid-band (C-band) spectrum to deliver a top-of-the-line 5G experience. 5G Ultra Wideband provides game-changing benefits, like speeds up to 10x faster than what you have now. 5G Nationwide is the everyday 5G available across the country. It uses a low-band spectrum to provide great coverage with performance comparable to our award-winning 4G LTE, and is only getting better over time By deploying both technologies together alongside 4G, customers get an excellent, reliable network experience around the country. Where is 5G available? Verizon is constantly expanding their 5G coverage. We just expanded 5G Ultra Wideband and will cover more than 100M people in the first quarter of 2022. 5G Ultra Wideband has also been especially deployed in crowded locations so people can stream and share when connected, like in arenas, airports, and downtown cities and towns. We also provide 5G Nationwide service in over 2,700 markets. To see our current 5G coverage map, showcasing the cities and towns with 5G Nationwide and 5G Ultra Wideband, visit https://www.verizon.com/coverage-map/". What phones support 5G? We said we would lead on 5G, and we are. We were the first in the world to enable a commercial 5G mobile network with a commercially-available smartphone, the 5G moto mod. We currently provide the most 5G devices available on any 5G network. And we're committed to continuing to offer you the latest, most advanced models as we expand our 5G footprint nationwide. View our 5G-capable smartphones How do I know if my phone is 5G-compatible? If your phone is 5G-compatible, you should see a 5G icon in the top bar of your phone when you're in an area with 5G coverage. If you're not sure and you have an Android phone, tap on Settings >> Network & Internet >> Mobile Network >> Preferred Network type. You should see all the mobile network technologies that your phone supports such as 2G, 3G, 4G, and 5G. If 5G is listed, then your phone supports it. Will 5G work on 4G phones? In order to access 5G service, you'll need a 5G-capable phone. For 5G Ultra Wideband service--which is available in select areas--you'll need to be inside a 5G Ultra Wideband coverage area and use a 5G Ultra Wideband-capable device with a 5G Ultra Wideband mobile plan. To access 5G Nationwide, which is available in 2,700+ cities, you'll need a 5G Nationwide-capable device, which automatically connects when you're in a 5G coverage area. Most devices manufactured in 2020 will require you to download a software update that adds the 5G Nationwide capability. View list of updates To see available 5G-capable Ultra Wideband* and 5G Nationwide** smartphones and devices, visit our 5G phones and devices page. 15G Ultra Wideband available in select areas. 5G Nationwide available in 2,700+ cities. 5G Nationwide access requires a 5G Nationwide-capable device. 5G Ultra Wideband access requires a 5G-capable device inside the 5G Ultra Wideband coverage area. Galaxy S21+ 5G (Certified Pre-Owned)Phantom Silver Phantom Violet Phantom Black PreviousPage 1 selected1Page 1 selected2NextCertified Pre-Owned PhonesCertified Pre-Owned Phones For Sale at VerizonIf you're looking for a great deal on a smartphone, you may be interested in exploring used cell phones or certified pre-owned phones. When purchasing a certified pre-owned phone, you won't just save money– you'll also be doing good for the environment by opting for a used phone.If you're in the market for a previously owned phone, it's important to know that anyone can sell an old device and call it a “used phone” or a “pre-owned phone.” That's why it's important to understand the difference between a used, refurbished, and certified pre-owned phone. At Verizon, “certified pre-owned” refers to the selection of pre-owned smartphones Verizon sells. These phones are refurbished phones that have been inspected and are in full working order, and come in a variety of conditions. For example, a device in “Great” condition may just have a few scratches and scuffs (but is still in perfect working order). If you're in the market for a refurbished iPhone, refurbished Samsung phone, and beyond, our certified pre-owned phones might be right for you.Free phones, and more used smartphone dealsWhen looking for a certified pre-owned phone, you may have cost savings on the top of your mind. At Verizon, we have a variety of great deals on smartphones, including certified pre-owned phones, free phones, and beyond.For example, if you're looking for a refurbished, certified pre-owned iPhone or Samsung phone, you can shop them all (and many more) at Verizon. Additionally, if you're looking to trade-in an old phone or bring your own device when switching to Verizon, you can do that, too. Simply visit our Trade-In or Bring Your Own Device pages to get started. There are plenty of ways to save on a smartphone when shopping at Verizon, and purchasing a certified pre-owned phone can be a cost-effective option for many. Left out details just to get a sale. I’m still not very happy about this after being a long time customer.All reviewsiPhone 15, iPhone 15 Plus, iPhone 15 Pro, and iPhone 15 Pro Max are splash, water, and dust resistant and were tested under controlled laboratory conditions with a rating of IP68 under IEC standard 60529 (maximum depth of 6 meters up to 30 minutes). Splash, water, and dust resistance are not permanent conditions. Resistance might decrease as a result of normal wear. Do not attempt to charge a wet iPhone; refer to the user guide for cleaning and drying instructions. Liquid damage not covered under warranty. The display has rounded corners. When measured as a standard rectangle, the screen is 6.12 inches (iPhone 15 Pro, iPhone 15) or 6.69 inches (iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPhone 15 Plus) diagonally. Actual viewable area is less. Battery life varies by use and configuration; see apple.com/batteries for more information. USB 3 cable with 10Gb/s speed required for up to 20x faster transfers on iPhone 15 Pro models. Wi-Fi 6E available in countries and regions where supported. Service is included for free for two years with the activation of any iPhone 15 model. Connection and response times vary based on location, site conditions, and other factors. See support.apple.com/kb/HT213885 for more information. iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Pro can detect a severe car crash and call for help. Requires a cellular connection or Wi-Fi Calling. Splash, water, and dust resistance are not permanent conditions. Resistance might decrease as a result of normal wear. Do not attempt to charge a wet iPhone; refer to the user guide for cleaning and drying instructions. Liquid damage not covered under warranty. The display has rounded corners. When measured as a standard rectangle, the screen is 6.12 inches (iPhone 15 Pro, iPhone 15) or 6.69 inches (iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPhone 15 Plus) diagonally. Actual viewable area is less. Subject to eligibility.Details Free 2 Day Shipping with new lineFree Express PickupSelect a storePro On the Go store selectedOverviewSpecsReviewsFAQsOverview tab selected 1 of 4 Overview Section StartThe Samsung Galaxy S Series has a legacy of pushing the boundaries of what a smartphone can do, and with Galaxy S23 Ultra, they’re raising that bar again. Galaxy S23 Ultra features the highest camera resolution on a phone, and with stunning Night Mode powered by Nightography, you can take your best shots no matter the lighting. Plus, with the fastest Snapdragon processor yet, you can juggle high-intensity games and toggle between multiple apps or video calls with ease. Working on the go? Write, sketch, edit, create and share from anywhere with a built-in S Pen. Do all this and more on an incredibly large display built for gaming, streaming, creating and doing– and now you can pair it with Verizon’s ultra-fast 5G Ultra Wideband network. Sep 14, 2023Is the 512gb of memory space include the pre-installed sim card or is the sim card adding additional storage space to the already 512gb?Answer this questionAnswer from Verizon Customer Support29 daysSIM cards do not hold or affect any storage. -MelissaWas this answer helpful?Yes (0)No (0)Report as inappropriateAnswer from Verizon Customer Support29 daysTanya, SIM stores information your device uses to connect to a carrier's mobile network. It also identifies your device and your plan with the carrier. The memory space on a device is completely separated from the SIM Card use. https://www.verizon.com/support/4g-sim-card-faqs/#:~:text=SIM%20stores%20information%20your%20device,your%20plan%20with%20the%20carrier. -NatashaWas this answer helpful?Yes (0)No (0)Report as inappropriateTom O . Sep 5, 2023Can the S23 Ultra use both a physical SIM and an eSIM (i.e., two separate lines)?Answer this questionAnswer from Verizon Customer Support1 monthThe Galaxy S23 supports Dual SIM via eSIM. You can learn more about Dual SIM here: https://www.verizon.com/support/dual-sim-with-esim-faqs/-JohnWas this answer helpful?Yes (0)No (0)Report as inappropriateAnswer from Verizon Customer Support1 monthThe Galaxy S23 Series offers a Dual SIM slot and also has eSIM support. Details and information here: https://www.verizon.com/support/dual-sim-with-esim-faqs/ ~MariaWas this answer helpful?Yes (0)No (0)Report as inappropriateJoanna . Sep 4, 2023Is the galaxy 23 ultra waterproofAnswer this questionAnswer from Samsung1 monthSalutations Joanna, thanks for taking the available time out of your busy day to ask us your question about the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra. No, the Galaxy S23 Ultra is not waterproof. It is, however, water and dust resistant based on an IP68 rating. This device was tested for submersion in fresh water deeper than 1.5 meters or keep it submerged for more than 30 minutes. If device is exposed to fresh water, dry it thoroughly with a clean, soft cloth; if exposed to liquid other than fresh water, rinse with fresh water and dry as directed. Let us know if you have any other questions for us by contacting Samsung Support. Thank you for being a faithful Samsung customer. - DebraWas this answer helpful?Yes (0)No (0)Report as inappropriateAnswer from Verizon Customer Support1 monthThe Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra is IP68 rated. IP68 rating signifies that the Galaxy S23 Ultra is completely dustproof and can withstand being submerged in water for 30 minutes. The '6' in the IP rating stands for solid particle (i.e., dust) ingress protection. It's the highest level of solid particle protection, meaning the Galaxy S23 Ultra is completely dust-tight. ~PeterWas this answer helpful?Yes (0)No (0)Report as inappropriateSondra . Sep 2, 2023Is the Samsung galaxy s23 ultra water proof?Answer this questionAnswer from Samsung1 monthSalutations Sondra, thanks for taking the available time out of your busy day to ask us your question about the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra. No. The Galaxy S23 is water and dust resistant. However, the S23 Ultra is not impervious to dust and water damage in any situation. It is important that all compartments are closed tightly. Follow these tips carefully to prevent damage to the device and maintain dust and water resistance performance: > Water resistant based on IP68 rating, which tests submersion in fresh water deeper than 1.5 meters or keep it submerged for more than 30 minutes. If device is exposed to fresh water, dry it thoroughly with a clean, soft cloth; if exposed to liquid other than fresh water, rinse with fresh water and dry as directed. > Any device which uses accessible compartments or ports that can be opened should have these sealed or closed tightly to prevent liquid from entering the system. > If the device has been immersed in water or the microphone or speaker is wet, sound may not be heard clearly during a call. After wiping the device with a dry cloth, dry it thoroughly before using it. > Do not expose the device to water at high pressure. > If the device is dropped or receives an impact, the water and dust resistant features of the device may be damaged. > If dust or foreign materials enter the microphone, speaker, or receiver, the device sound may become quiet or certain features may not work. If you attempt to remove the dust or foreign materials with a sharp object, the device may be damaged, and its appearance may be affected. > If the air vent hole is covered by an accessory of type, unwanted noises may occur during calls or media playback. NOTE: Liquid other than fresh water may enter the device faster. Failure to rinse the device in fresh water and dry it as instructed may cause the device to suffer from operability or cosmetic issues. If you have any additional questions, please feel free to reach out to Samsung Support. Thank you for being a faithful Samsung customer. - DebraWas this answer helpful?Yes (0)No (0)Report as inappropriateAnswer from Verizon Customer Support1 monthThe S23 Ultra has a water-resistance rating of IP68, which means your phone can be submerged in water for up to 30 minutes at a depth of 1.5 meters. Also, it is resistant to dust, dirt and if water droplets land on the screen. -JosephWas this answer helpful?Yes (0)No (0)Report as inappropriatePreviousPage 1 selected1Page 1 selected234Next Shop Devices Accessories Plans Home Internet & TV Deals TracFone Top Device Brands Samsung Apple Motorola Google Amazon Support Support overview Return policy Contact us Community Forums Sign in Download My Verizon App Lifeline Accessibility Check network status About Verizon About us Careers News Responsibility Verizon Innovative Learning Consumer info Articles Brochures Most Popular Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max Apple iPhone 15 Plus Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra Apple AirPods Max Disney Apple Watch Series 9 Fios Verizon Visa® Card Top Accessory Brands Otterbox ZAGG Beats Mophie JBL Fitbit Gear 4 Important Consumer Information Terms & Conditions Device Payment Terms & Conditions Report a security vulnerability Mobile customer agreement Announcements Radio frequency emissions Taxes & surcharges Recall Legal notices Follow Verizon facebook-official twitter you-tube instagram Follow Verizon Fios facebook-official twitter Site Map Privacy Policy California Privacy Notice Your Privacy Choices Your Privacy Choices Accessibility Open Internet Terms & Conditions About Our Ads © 2023 Verizon

Subject to eligibility.Details Free 2 Day Shipping with new lineFree Express PickupSelect a storePro On the Go store selectedOverviewSpecsReviewsFAQsOverview tab selected 1 of 4 Overview Section StartIntroducing Pixel 8 Pro, the all-pro phone engineered by Google. It’s sleek, powerful, and secure, with the best Pixel Camera yet. And the new Google Tensor G3 chip is custom-designed with Google AI for cutting-edge photo and video features and smarter ways to help throughout your day.1 Pair Pixel 8 Pro with Verizon, the network America relies on, and experience ultra-fast connectivity with Verizon’s 5G Ultra Wideband network, now in more and more places.All specsReviews4.34.3 out of 5 rating6 reviews80% of reviewers recommend this product.Write a reviewGreat phone 5 out of 5 ratingPixelprofan . 1 day agoCheck Mark GraphicYes, I'd recommend this product.This is the best pixel model so far!Upgrade from Pixel 2 XL 5 out of 5 ratingCripple352 . 2 days agoCheck Mark GraphicYes, I'd recommend this product.I've held out for 6 years with my Pixel 2 XL. Because I loved it so much. I finally pulled the trigger and got the Pixel 8 Pro. Let me start off by saying that I difficulty getting it activated. But, now after approximately 20-24 hours of using it, I absolutely love it. It's super responsive, The battery life appears to be great. The screen is rich and fluid. The only thing I would have done different would be to get the 1TB hard drive. It was only offered in the black color and I opted for the blue. The phone comes with 7 years of software and security updates. That's how confident Google is with this phone. My old Pixel only received 3 years of updates and I kept it for 6 and it's still a great phone. If you've been waiting for a really good phone that'll last for years, trust the Pixel brand phones, you can't go wrong.All reviewsCompared to earlier Pixel phones. When measured diagonally as a rectangle, screen is 6.7 inches. Actual viewable area is less. Dimension may vary by configuration and manufacturing process. Not available for all apps or content. Not available on all cameras or apps. Requires Google Photos app. Requires Google Photos app. May not work on all audio elements. Not available in all languages or countries. Not available on all media or apps. See g.co/pixel/livetranslate for more information. Translation may not be instantaneous. Not available in all countries or languages. See See g.co/pixel/callassist for details. Not available in all languages or countries. See g.co/pixel/googleassistant for details. Common Criteria certification for hardware and cryptographic library. See g.co/pixel/certifications for details. "Personal Safety app features like Crisis Alerts are dependent upon network connectivity and other factors and may not be available in all areas. For more information, see g.co/pixel/personalsafety." Car crash detection not available in all languages or countries. Car crash detection may not detect all accidents. High-impact activities may trigger calls to emergency services. This feature is dependent upon network connectivity and other factors and may not be reliable for emergency communications or available in all areas. For country and language availability and more information see g.co/pixel/carcrashdetection. For "over 24 hours”: Estimated battery life based on testing using a median Pixel user battery usage profile across a mix of talk, data, standby, and use of other features. Average battery life during testing was approximately 31 hours. Battery testing conducted on a major carrier network. For "Up to 72 hours”: Estimated battery life based on testing using a median Pixel user battery usage profile across a mix of talk, data, standby, and use of limited other features that are default in Extreme Battery Saver mode (which disables various features including 5G connectivity). Battery testing conducted on a major carrier network. For both claims: Battery testing conducted in California in mid 2023 on pre-production hardware and software using default settings, except that, for the "up to 72 hours” claim only, Extreme Battery Saver mode was enabled. Battery life depends upon many factors and usage of certain features will decrease battery life. Actual battery life may be lower. Designed to comply with dust and water protection rating IP68 under IEC standard 60529 when each device leaves the factory but the device is not water or dust proof. The accessories are not water or dust resistant. Water resistance and dust resistance are not permanent conditions and will diminish or be lost over time due to normal wear and tear, device repair, disassembly or damage. Phone is not drop/tumble proof and dropping your device may result in loss of water/dust resistance. Damage from drops, tumbles, and other external forces are not covered under warranty. Liquid damage voids the warranty. See g.co/pixel/water for details. Some third-party apps and data may not be transferred automatically. Visit g.co/pixel/copydatahelp for information. Oct 11, 2023Is the Pixel 8 PRO bought from this website locked for Verizon ? Also does the phone bought from this website have same 5G, 4G etc bands compared to global models ? Any difference in your phones?Answer this questionAnswer from Verizon Customer Support3 daysDevices that you purchase from Verizon are locked for 60 days after purchase. Devices that you purchase from one of our authorized retailers are locked for 60 days after activation. After 60 days, we will automatically remove the lock unless the device is deemed stolen or purchased fraudulently: https://www.verizon.com/support/device-unlocking-policy/ To view all compatible bands on the Pixel 8 Pro, please click here, see Specs tab, and scroll down to "Network": https://www.verizon.com/smartphones/google-pixel-8-pro/Was this answer helpful?Yes (0)No (0)Report as inappropriateAsil . Personal Business Have a phone you love? Get up to $540 when you bring your phone. Or get iPhone 14 Pro or iPhone 14 on us. Online only. With Unlimited Ultimate. Buy now | Offer Details $540 via promo credit when you add a new smartphone line with your own 4G/5G smartphone on Unlimited Ultimate plan req'd. Promo credit applied over 36 months; promo credits end if eligibility requirements are no longer met. Promotional credits for this Bring your own Device (BYOD) offer may not be combined with other promotional offers. Limited time offer.Up to $999.99 device payment or full retail purchase w/ new smartphone line on Unlimited Ultimate plan req'd. Less up to $999.99 promo credit applied over 36 mos.; promo credit ends if eligibility req’s are no longer met; 0% APR. end of navigation menu Shop / Trade in Trade in your phone, tablet, or smartwatch. It’s safer, smarter and easier than you think. Get started How to trade in your device: 1.Tell us about the device you would like to trade in. 2.Be sure to back up yourcontent and clear your data. 3.Mail your old device to uswithin 15 days. 4.We’ll apply your credit oncewe receive your device. Get started Let’s get started. Which device are you trading in? Trading in your phone, tablet, smartwatch or other device is easy with our Device Trade-in Program. Just tell us the device and its condition and you’ll get a new one, instant credit, account credit, or gift card. Phone Watch Tablet Other Trade in your Apple or Samsung device for a new one. Upgrade your old iPhone, iPad or Samsung device and receive a new one, instant credit, account credit, or gift card towards a new Verizon device. Apple Trade-in iPhone Trade-in Apple Watch Trade-in iPad Trade-in Samsung Trade-in Android Trade-in Buy now, trade in later. In a rush for a new phone, tablet or smartwatch? With our Device Trade-in Program, you can start shopping now and trade in later. You’ll still receive the same trade-in value in the form of instant credit, account credit, or gift card. Shop all We've got your trade-in covered. Simple and easy. Trade in your old phone, smartwatch or tablet in four simple steps. Safety first. We follow strict federal guidelines to make sure your old device is completely erased. Get all the credit. Reap the rewards and apply the value of your trade-in to an upgrade. Landfills lose. Recycle your old device and help reduce e-waste, so the environment wins. Check your trade-in status. If you’ve already started your trade-in, you can track your status—every step of the way. Check status Have questions? We've got answers. How do I clear personal information and content from my device before trading it in? Find instructions for clearing your specific mobile device on our Device Support Overview pages. You'll also get an email with instructions after you submit your trade-in. I changed my mind, can I get my old device back? Device trade-ins are final. After you accept the trade-in credit and send us your device you can't get the device back. What types of devices can I trade in? You can trade in these devices: Smartphones Tablets Smartwatches Basic phones Mobile hotspot devices Netbooks 3G prepaid phones that have been active for at least 6 months 4G prepaid phones that have been activated and at least the first month payment has been made We don't accept these devices for trade in: Vehicle Diagnostics or Delphi Connect Samsung Galaxy Camera® Other connected devices For more information, visit our Device Trade-in Program Terms & Conditions. What trade-in promotions does Verizon have right now? See all current Verizon deals. How do I check my device's IMEI? To find your IMEI on your device if you’re a Verizon customer: Go to the My Devices page in My Verizon. Tap or click Manage Device next to the device you want to view. Your Device ID and IMEI are listed under the Device Information section. If your device has a removable battery, the IMEI will also be located under the battery. If you're not a Verizon customer: Android devices: Settings > About Phone iOS devices: Settings > General > About Basic Phones: Tools & Settings > About Phone > Status How do I trade in a device if I'm a business customer? Visit our Device Trade-In for Business Program Guide to learn how to trade in your device. View all FAQs Are you a new or existing customer? months, 0% APRRetail price: $2399.99PreviousPage 1 selected1Page 1 selected2NextTablets and Laptops Available at VerizoniPad, Samsung Chromebook, and More Tablets to Shop NowTablets hit the scene in the 2010's, with the Apple iPad making its stellar debut in April 2010. Since then, iPad and other tablets have come a long way; from cellular connectivity capabilities to snap-on keyboards giving them laptop-like functionality, tablets have transformed how we work, play, and communicate with each other in the modern world.For Apple users, the latest iPad models allow users to do everything from creating their latest digital masterpiece to gaming on the go with ease, featuring power-house Bionic chips to fuel this all-star tablet experience. Plus, you can integrate your iOS experience by pairing your iPad with your Macbook, iPhone, and Airpods.More of an Android user? Samsung tablets, like the Samsung Galaxy Tab series, allow Android users to also integrate their device ecosystem, as well as keep them connected all day long with long-lasting battery life. There are also plenty of kid-friendly tablets available, such as the TCL tablets, which allow your child to do everything from play educational games to connect with their friends and family members via video calls. Looking to connect your tablet to Verizon's 5G Ultra Wideband1 network? At Verizon, you can shop our tablet plans and connect your 5G capable tablets with ease, allowing you to work, play, and connect with others on the go with ultra-fast 5G Ultra Wideband speeds.Shop Laptops and Connect Them to a Device PlanMaybe you have a tablet already, but you're looking for a more PC-like experience. In that case, there are a variety of tablets that allow users to snap on a compatible keyboard, allowing you to transform your tablet into a working laptop when you need to type, write, or edit documents on the go.For users seeking a more traditional laptop, the Samsung Galaxy Chromebook Go series is a great option. Thin and light, the Galaxy Chromebook Go fits easily into backpacks so you can take it anywhere. And, the long-lasting battery keeps you powered through the day whether you're working or playing.You can also connect laptops, smartwatches and other connected devices to Verizon's mobile network: shop our laptop plans. Or, if you're seeking to save on a new iPad or other tablet, you can explore our iPad trade-in deals and learn what your current device is worth.1. 5G Ultra Wideband available in select areas. Out of stockSilver - Out of stockPreviousPage 1 selected1Page 1 selected2NextConnected SmartwatchesConnected smartwatches available at VerizonYou may own a smartwatch already and be interested in upgrading to the newest model, or perhaps you're just dipping your toes into the smartwatch world– either way, Verizon has a variety of smartwatches available for users to shop that connect to their smartphones for an easy, seamless user experience. At Verizon, we offer a variety of Apple Watch models (like the all-new Apple Watch Series 7), Android smartwatches, and beyond. We also sell watch accessories, like watch bands, watch screen protectors, watch chargers, and more so you can always make sure your device is charged, protected, and accessorized to your liking.Verizon also has a variety of styles of smartwatches perfect for both men, women and even kids, meaning you can shop a variety of products that suit your particular style and taste. So, which smartwatch is right for you?Which smartwatch should you buy?The best smartwatch for you depends on the devices you plan to pair it with, the style you're looking for, as well as size and a few other key factors. The Apple Watch Series 7, for example, comes in a variety of colors and two different sizes, and pairs seamlessly with your iPhone 6S or later with the most recent iOS version. What's more, Verizon has a variety of Apple Watch Bands you can shop, so you can make sure your Apple Watch looks stylish with any outfit you choose to pair it with.Android smartwatches also pair to different Android devices, such as the Samsung Galaxy Watch4, which pairs with your Android device operating on Android 6 or higher. Samsung Galaxy Watch4 and Samsung Galaxy Watch4 Classic also come in a variety of colors, and the Samsung Galaxy Watch4 Classic offers two sizing options as well, so you can choose how large you want your display to be. Connected smartwatches can help you stay on track with everything from your health and wellness to your texts, emails, and beyond, and look stylish while doing it. No matter which you choose, Verizon has a variety of smartwatches and smartwatch accessories to browse now, both in-store and online. Verizon's certified pre-owned designation means all the refurbished or used smartwatches come quality-assured, with our rigorous inspection process ensuring all CPO smartwatches for sale at Verizon are in good working condition and are 100% functional.From a wide selection of used Apple Watches to used Galaxy Watches and beyond, Verizon has a variety of certified pre-owned smartwatches available to shop anytime. So, if you're looking for the latest Apple Watch and Galaxy Watch models or another new-to-you smartwatch or wearable, you've come to the right place.Wondering which Apple Watch is right for you? Visit our Apple Watch comparison page here to learn more about each Apple Watch series. Or, if you're looking for the latest and greatest in smartwatch tech, you can shop all our brand-new connected smartwatches here.Smartphone deals to shop now at VerizonWhen buying a certified pre-owned smartwatch you can pay a competitive price for some of the latest wearable tech. With our inspection guarantee you don't have to worry about your used smartwatch working (like you might when buying from a third party), and you can ensure your smartwatch works like it should while still saving money. For those looking for a deal, certified pre-owned smartwatches are a great option. In addition to certified pre-owned smartwatches, Verizon has a large selection of certified pre-owned smartphones you can shop now. Verizon's inventory of certified pre-owned smartphones come with the same quality inspection and quality assurance promises, meaning they're 100% functional and in good, working condition at purchase. So, if you're looking to save, there are many deals available on new smartphones, and even free smartphones, that you can shop at Verizon anytime. Explore Verizon's free phone deals here.Whether you're looking for savings on a used or new wearable device or smartphone, Verizon has something for everyone. Get what you want at a competitive price when you shop certified pre-owned smartwatches or smartphones at Verizon. Whether you're working remotely or keeping in touch with family and friends on the go, having a strong internet connection wherever you are is essential. Your smartphone is a powerful data-driven device, but what if hotspotting from your phone doesn't offer a strong enough connection in certain situations?In those times when you need a strong, reliable connection for your devices, you can use a mobile hotspot. A mobile hotspot is a device that allows you to create a secure Wi-Fi network and connect all your devices to your safe, password protected private network. Hotspots are becoming more popular in the work-from-anywhere era, and you have plenty of options to choose from.You can shop for a variety of portable mobile hotspot devices at Verizon. You can also make sure you'll have reliable data for your hotspot when you need it with a connected device plan. Wi-Fi portable hotspots and moreSome popular choices for Wi-Fi portable hotspots include options from brands like Orbic, Inseego, and Verizon, with each allowing you to connect multiple devices to your private network with ease. Some even allow for fast-charging and come with super long-lasting batteries, meaning you don't have to worry about your hotspot dying when you're in a pinch.Wi-Fi calling is also an option, and when using a mobile hotspot you can power your phone on your own network, meaning you can call family and friends even when you're low on data or cellular service. Wi-Fi calling can be enabled on most Android and iPhone devices; simply visit your “Settings” app to enable Wi-Fi calling on Android, or use your iPhone to connect to your hotspot like you would any other Wi-Fi network. If you're on a prepaid plan, prepaid hotspots and other internet devices are available for sale at Verizon. You can even get a Verizon router on a prepaid plan, helping you save on home internet, too. No matter which hotspot device you choose, you can browse a variety of options and save on internet service when you need it with Verizon. cell phone cases that can protect your new smartphone? At Verizon, we offer a wide array of phone cases and other accessories that you can shop any time. From cases compatible with the latest iPhone 13 series to Samsung Galaxy and Google Pixel friendly cases and beyond, you can have peace of mind knowing your phone is protected at all times with both sturdy and stylish phone cases.If you're looking for cases that fit iPhone, you can shop a variety of iPhone compatible cases with Verizon, meaning your smartphone can remain protected even if it's not the latest model. Samsung compatible cases are also available, as well as cases for Google devices and many other smartphones. Shoppers can also browse case bundles with Verizon to save money on popular phone accessories, which may come with other accessories such as screen protectors, wireless charging options, and beyond.Sturdy and stylish phone cases available at Verizon When it comes to phone cases, both form and fashion are top of mind for most shoppers. At Verizon, you can shop heavy-duty durable cases from brands like Otterbox, as well as fashion-forward cases from brands such as Coach and Kate Spade, meaning you don't have to spare style when shopping for a reliable phone case.Looking for a particular color for your phone case? If you're looking to stand out from the crowd with a bright, fun color, you may opt for a stunning pink phone case like these. If you're going for a more sleek, sophisticated look, you may seek out a black phone case like so. Either way, a wide variety of colors and shades are available, meaning you can express yourself even when your phone is in its case.Phone cases protect your smartphone from damage and keep them looking stylish– shop the latest phone cases for your device with Verizon. for Galaxy Z Flip5star iconstar iconstar iconstar iconstar iconstar iconstar iconstar iconstar iconstar icon(0)star rating 0 out of 5 and 0 review$49.99PreviousPage 1 selected1Page 1 selected234NextPhone Screen Protectors Why you might need a screen protector on your iPhone or Android smartphoneSmartphones allow users to do everything from talk and text to stream, surf the web, and take photos and videos on the go. Known for their large, user-friendly touchscreens, these phones have become the mainstream model of communication in the modern day. These touchscreens, however strong they may be, don't always stand up to the inevitable drops, bumps and scratches that come with daily use; which is why you might need a screen protector.Screen protectors protect your device's screen from scratches, scuffs and bumps, and some are even antimicrobial (offering protection against germs) or come with tempered glass to protect your eyes from potentially harmful blue light rays. At Verizon, we offer a variety of screen protectors for all popular devices from Apple iPhones to Samsung Galaxys and more, in multiple finishes. That means you can choose the one that fits your personal needs, be it tempered glass, antimicrobial, plastic, or for privacy reasons.You can also buy screen protectors for your tablet. That way you can ensure all your devices are protected from the wear and tear of daily use (including when your kids take the tablet to play Minecraft, of course). Pair your screen protector with a new phone case and other accessoriesScreen protectors are one important way to protect your device from getting damaged, but having a solid phone case to protect the rest of your phone is equally important. From extra-durable picks like OtterBox phone cases that protect from hard falls and even water, to the stylish Kate Spade and Coach cases that pair well with any outfit, you're sure to be covered (and your cell phone protected) from drops, spills, and bumps wherever you go.If you're looking to save on a new phone case or screen protector, you may want to consider purchasing a phone case bundle. Bundles also typically come with a phone case and screen protector, which may be more economical than buying each accessory separately. Additionally, some phone case bundles even come with charging blocks and other helpful accessories you can pair with your device.Looking for other smartphone accessories? Verizon offers a wide variety of headphones, phone chargers, MagSafe products, and more to help you protect, charge, and use your device more efficiently. and 0 review$49.99PreviousPage 1 selected1Page 1 selected234NextMagSafe AccessoriesWhat are Apple MagSafe products? Apple and their line of smartphones and other products took the mobile phone world by storm with the introduction of the first iPhone models in June 2007. A phone that was both easy to use and sleek in form made it an instant hit, and it's only gotten better ever since. You may know a lot about recent iPhone models, but do you know about the Magsafe technology available on iPhone 12 models and later?Originally intended to help users charge their Macbooks more efficiently, Magsafe introduced magnetic technology to iPhone that allows for fast, secure wireless charging (and much more). By adding these magnets to the internal engineering of iPhone, users can now simply lay their phones down onto a Magsafe charger and give their phone a battery boost in mere moments.This technology is proprietary to Apple, and can be used with other Apple products, too. Users can charge their AirPods with Magsafe chargers, as well as Macbooks and beyond. Magsafe chargers, wallets, cases, and moreNow that you know what Magsafe technology is, you may be wondering how to use them or how they'll improve your iPhone user experience. The Magsafe Wireless Charger, for example, is designed to quickly and safely charge your iPhone. The system intelligently adapts to conditions in order to optimize charging your iPhone at up to 15W of peak power delivery for faster wireless charging. There are also Magsafe battery packs available, which can be charged separately and snapped onto the back of your phone when you need a little more juice on the go. Magsafe wallets, on the other hand, use magnets to snap onto the back of your iPhone directly, or onto an iPhone case with Magsafe. Featuring a secure NFC chip which enables support for Find My, it can hold up to three cards, and it's shielded to keep them safe. However, it's important to note that in order to use an NFC-enabled card, such as a hotel key, you need to remove the card from the wallet.Additionally, Magsafe iPhone cases ensure that your phone can remain protected while still being able to connect to your magnetic accessories. These cases have magnets integrated into the back, which allows for the iPhone to securely snap directly onto a Magsafe case. The magnets in these cases also allow external Magsafe accessories, such as the wireless charger, to do the same. Apple has designed a line of these cases made of leather and silicone which come in a variety of colors, which you can shop now at Verizon. Out of stockSilver - Out of stockPreviousPage 1 selected1Page 1 selected2NextConnected SmartwatchesConnected smartwatches available at VerizonYou may own a smartwatch already and be interested in upgrading to the newest model, or perhaps you're just dipping your toes into the smartwatch world– either way, Verizon has a variety of smartwatches available for users to shop that connect to their smartphones for an easy, seamless user experience. At Verizon, we offer a variety of Apple Watch models (like the all-new Apple Watch Series 7), Android smartwatches, and beyond. We also sell watch accessories, like watch bands, watch screen protectors, watch chargers, and more so you can always make sure your device is charged, protected, and accessorized to your liking.Verizon also has a variety of styles of smartwatches perfect for both men, women and even kids, meaning you can shop a variety of products that suit your particular style and taste. So, which smartwatch is right for you?Which smartwatch should you buy?The best smartwatch for you depends on the devices you plan to pair it with, the style you're looking for, as well as size and a few other key factors. The Apple Watch Series 7, for example, comes in a variety of colors and two different sizes, and pairs seamlessly with your iPhone 6S or later with the most recent iOS version. What's more, Verizon has a variety of Apple Watch Bands you can shop, so you can make sure your Apple Watch looks stylish with any outfit you choose to pair it with.Android smartwatches also pair to different Android devices, such as the Samsung Galaxy Watch4, which pairs with your Android device operating on Android 6 or higher. Samsung Galaxy Watch4 and Samsung Galaxy Watch4 Classic also come in a variety of colors, and the Samsung Galaxy Watch4 Classic offers two sizing options as well, so you can choose how large you want your display to be. Connected smartwatches can help you stay on track with everything from your health and wellness to your texts, emails, and beyond, and look stylish while doing it. No matter which you choose, Verizon has a variety of smartwatches and smartwatch accessories to browse now, both in-store and online. $39.99DetailsPreviousPage 1 selected1Page 1 selected234NextAccessories on SaleDiscount cell phone accessoriesYou've got that brand new smartphone, but now you're looking for a great price on accessories to compliment your new device. Maybe you're in the market for a phone case that will protect your device against the elements, or perhaps you're in search of an additional phone charger. If you want to shop these products without breaking the bank, you've come to the right place. At Verizon we offer tons of cell phone accessory deals, including discounts on chargers, headphones and headsets, and beyond. From cheap phone cases to keep your smartphone safe to portable speakers to allow you to project your playlist from your phone to the dance floor, you can save money on your favorite tech gear when you shop our accessory and product sales.You can even shop smart home products for sale at Verizon, including smart doorbells, cameras, and more. No matter what technology features you're looking for, you can find great savings on it all. Gaming headset deals, Otterbox deals and moreIf you're looking for more savings on top tier smartphone, gaming, and other tech accessories, Verizon has plenty of popular brands available at great prices. If you're in the market for gaming headsets and other gaming gear, you can shop our gaming store any time.Interested in shopping for phone case brands at a discounted price? Otterbox deals are also available at Verizon, including some of their most popular, protective cases for iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, and other sought after devices. Accessories aren't all you can save money on, though; at Verizon we offer deals on popular smartphones, phone plans, free cell phones, and much more all year round. These deals change and are refreshed often, so keep checking in to see what's on sale currently. Shop all our deals now.
